projects.title: Pramega
projects.description: an ecommerce app developed with Next.js and powered by Strapi. With a focus on seamless user experience, it ensures smooth product exploration, efficient cart management, and rapid responsiveness.

projects.title: Messenger
projects.description: a real-time chat application meticulously developed using React for the frontend and powered by Pocketbase on the backend. Seamlessly facilitating dynamic conversations, swift updates, and an intuitive interface.
